page.title: 09Education_Junior School
page.content: {Pupils}.The Hunmanby Junior School has about 220 pupils in the school.The infants start school at 9.a.m. and work until 10.30 a.m.Then they have a break until 10.45 a.m.At 12 p.m. they have another break and their dinner. Then they go in at 1 p.m.They have another break at 2.15 p.m. till 2.45 p.m. and they go home at 3.15 p.m.The juniors day is a little bit different, they only have 15 minutes break at 2.15 p.m. and they go home at a later time of 3.30 p.m.The average age in the school is about 6 to 7,but they start at 4+ and go to 10+. {Trips.}The School sometimes goes on trips.The most local trip is to Filey beach.They have other local trips like York,Hull and Whitby.Others are as far as London.They also have nature trips to Hunmanby Hall.
